data.title: Our Patrons · WORDTheatre
data.text:
If you’d like to be added to our email list, click HERE

To learn about the perks of Membership, click HERE!

Help support the creation of all our original programming, including Saturday Stories (our free weekly podcast), and WORDTheatre Campus (our work in under-resourced schools) by becoming a Patron or Enthusiast Member.

WORDTheatre is a 501 (c)(3) in the US Tax ID: #95-4379725

WORDTheatreUK is a Dual Charitable Trust: #1203917

Patron & Enthusiast Memberships automatically renew after 3 reminder emails.
